about_the_game:
'Mark My Words' is a roguelike Deck-builder where strategic wordplay meets challenging modifiers.

Create high-scoring words with your Letter set as you try to get through increasingly difficult rounds. Each Letter has an initial value, but as the game progresses you will have the opportunity to upgrade your Letters and increase their value in various ways.

The ultimate word-building roguelike: Strategically create Words to score as high as possible.

  • Endless strategic possibilities: Upgrade your Letters, discover Stickers, unlock Glyphs and master the art of wordplay.

  • Challenging rounds: Beat progressively tougher scores to advance.

  • Customizable Decks: Expand your Deck with new Letters and Stickers from the Shop.

  • Multiple game modes: Three game modes that challenge you in different ways.

Wield a versatile array of tools as you delve deeper into the game:

  • Your Collection of Stickers: Each offering different ways to enhance your Words.

  • Combinable Letter Effects: Alter your Letters to maximize their potential.

  • Shop for strategic growth: Purchase new Letters, Stickers and Glyphs to refine your strategy.

Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of ‘Mark My Words’, where every word counts and every decision can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

  • Unlock new content: Discover new Letters, Stickers, and Glyphs with each run.

  • Hypnotizing sounds: Synthwave sounds that invite you to drift away.

  • In-depth stats: Analyze your best words, most used tiles, and more to refine your strategies for future runs.

  • Simple but compelling visuals: Enjoy hand-crafted art that complements the engaging gameplay.
